canteen.en: The canteen is in the APJ block near the east S J block.
canteen.ta: Canteen  S J block pakkathula  APJ block la iruku.

library.en: The library is in the GG block, ground floor
library.ta: Library GG block la, ground floor la irukku.

admission.en: The admission office is in the S J block, near to the room SJB-108.
admission.ta: Admission office S J block-la, SJB-108 room la  irukku.

exam cell.en: The exam cell is in the first P G block,2nd floor.
exam cell.ta: Exam cell P G block la,second floor la  irukku.

IT department.en: The I T department is on 1st floor of S J block.
IT department.ta: I T department S J block la first floor la room number 104 la irukku .

CSE department.en: The C S E department is on 2nd floor of S J block room number 320.
CSE department.ta: C S E department ku second floor la room number 320 iruku.

ECE department.en: The E C E department is on ground floor of S J block room number 103.
ECE department.ta: E C E department S J block la ground floor la room number 103 la irukku.
